entry.def: If you forego something, you decide to do without it, although you would like it.

example.ex: Keen skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
example.tran: 滑雪爱好者乐于利用暑期假日去滑雪。

means.word_mean: 1. be earlier in time; go back further;
